responsiveCarousel.title: Responsive Carousel
responsiveCarousel.description: I was bored one day and decided to build a custom carousel componment. This was way easier than I expected, so I started to make it dynamic so that the carousel items would recalculate their width based on the browser size. This was cool, but I realized that this wasn't super useful if the items would be squished on smaller screens. In order to fix this, I created a set of media queries that could be targeted in the component prop to control how many carousel items could be visible inside each media query. I figured this could be useful for others and I've always wanted to learn how to publish a React component on npm, so I did just that.

musicLibrary.title: Music Library
musicLibrary.description: You know that feeling when you discover a great song for the first time? This project aims to deliver this feeling by sharing tailored Spotify playlists ranging through all genres. I built the navigation in a way to resemble how you would flip through vinyls in a box or CDs on a shelf, which is all too familiar to a music lover.

nominapress.title: Nominapress
nominapress.description: I helped develop and maintain a human resources management app. Some notable features that I have worked on are:

randomShapes.title: Randomization
randomShapes.description: I am constantly learning how to better make code more dynamic. I had the idea to try and generate random colors. After I figured this out, I took the concept further and created random shapes of all sizes and colors that animate on random paths. The method uses Math.floor(Math.random() * number) to generate the random attributes.

gemini.title: Gemini Diversified Services
gemini.description: Gemini Diversified Services is a medical credentialing verification organization (CVO). Gemini wanted to position themselves unique against their competition, yet not stand out too different. Finding the right balance between these proved to be difficult; how far could we push the boundaries? In order to find equilibrium on the site, I used a mix of custom iconography, along with themed images and tag-lines dedicated to their California native sport - Surfing.

targetbase.title: Targetbase
targetbase.description: Targetbase is a ‚Äúdata-driven‚Äù marketing and advertising company mostly working with clients in the auto and healthcare industries. As a company, Targetbase was experimenting with a rebrand and knew that they needed a more up-to-date website. They hired me on as a contractor for roughly five months to help them potentially rebrand and to help create their new site.

about.paragraphPart1: Hi, I'm Sean. I'm a designer and front-end developer based in Madrid, Espa√±a. I currently work full-time for
about.paragraphPart2: as a Product Owner, where I help build an internal developer platform.  I am a life-long student and I'm always trying to learn new techniques, technologies, and languages. When I'm not working or learning, you can catch me hiking the great outdoors, curating Spotify playlists, and sparking up conversations with strangers.
